data.lyric:
[ti:Deck The Halls]
[ar:Nat King Cole]
[al:The Society of Singers Presents An All-Star Christmas]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Deck the Halls - Nat King Cole
[00:04.75]Deck the halls with boughs of holly
[00:07.06]Fa-la-la-la-la  la-la-la-la
[00:09.43]'Tis the season to be jolly
[00:11.54]Fa-la-la-la-la  la-la-la-la
[00:13.70]Don we now our gay apparel
[00:16.01]Fa-la-la  la-la-la  la-la-la
[00:18.15]Troll the ancient Yule-tide carol
[00:20.45]Fa-la-la-la-la  la-la-la-la
[00:22.66]
[00:25.16]Fa-la-la  la-la-la  la-la-la
[00:26.91]
[00:29.72]Fa-la-la  la-la-la  la-la-la
[00:31.46]
[00:33.91]Fa-la-la  la-la-la  la-la-la
[00:35.96]
[00:38.55]Fa-la-la  la-la-la  la-la-la
[00:40.57]See the blazing Yule before us
[00:42.98]Fa-la-la-la-la  la-la-la-la
[00:45.15]Strike the harp and join the chorus
[00:47.36]Fa-la-la-la-la  la-la-la-la
[00:49.67]Follow me in merry measure
[00:51.86]Fa-la-la-la-la  la-la-la-la
[00:54.31]While I tell of Yule-tide treasure
[00:56.34]Fa-la-la-la-la  la-la-la-la
[00:58.25]
[00:58.85]Fa-la-la-la-la  la-la-la-la
